statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, source, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE source LIKE '%Twitter%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, source FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_id DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, source FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01' AND source LIKE '%Twitter%' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT source FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedbacks > 5 ORDER BY total_feedbacks DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_source = 'Website';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, feedback_source FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_improvements WHERE implemented = true;
SELECT improvement_id, product_id, improvement_description FROM product_improvements ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_source FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedbacks FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(feedback_id) > 1;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_source = 'online' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM product_improvements WHERE product_id = 500 AND implemented = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_sources;
SELECT source_name, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback_sources WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback_sources WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM product_offerings WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM product_offerings WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback_sources ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT feedback_id, source_name FROM customer_feedback_sources WHERE feedback_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM product_offerings WHERE product_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, review_text, review_rating FROM customer_service_reviews WHERE review_rating >= 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT source_name, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback_sources GROUP BY source_name;
SELECT * FROM feedback_sources;
SELECT source_name FROM feedback_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 3;
SELECT sentiment_score, feedback_category FROM analytics WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 AND analysis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, timestamp FROM feedback_data WHERE source_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, source_id, feedback_text, timestamp FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id = 2 AND source_id = 4;
SELECT feedback_id, sentiment_score, feedback_category FROM analytics ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, analysis_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email_address, feedback_text FROM customers
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY email_address DESC
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE feedback_text IS NULL
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 100;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name='John Doe' OR customer_name='Jane Smith';
